ComicInfo.Title: Venus in Stone!
ComicInfo.Summary: Venus in Stone!: Xanatos arrives at the Gen-U-Tech island lab to collect his Medusa weapon, an advanced ray device that turns its target to stone. Demona fights him for it as she wants the weapon for herself. In retaliation for the wrongs done to their friend Lavonne, the Gargoyles and Elisa sneak onto the island and also face off with Xanatos. Dr. Phobos awakens his latest genetic experiment, a half-human half-gargoyle hybrid made from the DNA of Goliath and Elisa.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
